description: A clumsy 17 year old girl, who likes to read and do gardening. She has a mysterious ability to emit electromagnetic waves from her body when her emotions run high. This ability forces her to be unable to use electronic equipment of any kind. When the story begins, she had recently moved into town, and catches the attention of Kannagi Koutaro, an eccentric genius in her class. As the story progresses, she develops feelings for Kotarou and eventually ends up dating him.
name: Ebihara Chinami
